reviews.review: My favourite game of all time, absolutely amazing. The story is intense, the graphics are stunning and the gameplay is so fun. Buy it and play it. Amazing
it has such a good story and you can play for hours and not get bored

Absolutely amazing. The characters are likeable and fun, the puzzles are challenging and the story is exciting. This game wants me having more. 10/10 i would recommend this game to anyone.
A fantastic, hilarious, well thought out game. 10/10 would recommend :D
One of the best puzzle games of all time but everybody knows that. If you haven't played this game what are you doing

Total recommendation. In fact, stop reading these reviews and buy it right now. Great story, likable characters and overall just a great combination of the puzzle and action genre.

29/10

Portal is indescribably amazing, too extraordinary for description, too indefinite to be adequately described. It is inexpressible, it is incommunicable to the human mind. It is astonishing, astounding, surprising, bewildering, stunning, staggering, shocking, startling, stupefying, breathtaking, perplexing, confounding, dismaying, disconcerting, shattering. I rate it ∞/10

nice game to come back to, really fun, especially co-op, really hard, but I didn't get half the fun, I for some reason spoiled everything by watching videos, regret doing that.

9/10

its a fun but challaging game
You shoud get this relly good game!

Un jeu à la hauteur de sa réputation. La campagne est un pur délice visuel qui nécessite un minimum de réflexion et qui nous permet d'apprécier le jeu. Le mode multijoueur est tout autant magnifique malgré la courte durée de jeu de celui-ci. 

Un incontournable

At first I found it quite good fun but I felt it became a bit samey after a short while. And I keep playing it with the sole purpose of reaching the end which hasn't happened yet so I'm getting a bit annoyed. I love the plot as far as it goes which helps to keep my interest going but I'm now finding something has gone a bit limp with the plot and so its hard to keep my interest up. I keep finding myself wanting it to end but then I realise if it did end it would have been quite a short lived game for the money ? It's a shame the test thing doesn't end sooner so the whole game can shift a gear and breathe some fresh air into what grows to be quite a chore of a puzzle game. I was expecting more.  5 out of 10
рекомендую всем кто не играл в игру

Desde ya, la saga portal ha sido unas de las mas entretenidas. Es cierto que si jugas una y otra vez el modo campaña puede ser muy repetitivo, pero, en el modo CO-OP siempre tendras a alguien que sabra mas o alguien que sabra menos.
Siempre sera una experiencia nueva.
Jugabilidad e historia Excelente! Me encanto que ahora se tengan mas posibilidades para resolver puzzles. lo Ame!
fajnie sie chodzi trudna gra na jutuby sprawdzalem co hwile jak przejsci ale fajne szcelaki spiewaly na koniec 8.3/10

Portal 2 очень крутая головоломка, перепрохожу её 14 раз. Первая часть была очень интересной, хоть и заняла у меня очень много времени раньше, и я был очень рад тому что вышла 2 часть. Советую всем кто любит головоломки.
very epic, great fun with friends
